mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Every Dollar Spent Feeds Your Sense of Superiority!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I was seated in my private jet, sipping on champagne while flying to my luxury vacation home in the Maldives. Suddenly, my personal chef comes rushing in, in tears, claiming he forgot to pack the black truffle-infused caviar I specifically requested for my mid-flight snack. I mean, the audacity! I was so appalled by such incompetence that I demanded the pilot turn the jet around immediately. Who could possibly enjoy a vacation without their black truffle caviar? After a few tense moments, my chef miraculously found a backup stash hidden away in the jet's secret compartment. Crisis averted. Just another day in the life of a man of my stature!
